GsetPrefix:
Changes the prefix of the bot
```$prefix <new_prefix>
GdmMember:
Sends DM to a specific member
```$dm member/username/nickname message```
GsetPerms:
Sets permissions for a specific command
```$setperms command role1_id [role2_id...]```
GmessageChannel:
Messages a specific channel on the guild
```$send channel message```
Gexecute:
Executes a specified code snippet
```$execute code_to_execute```
GadminSwitch:
Addes/removes administrator permission to a specified role
```$adm```
GeditMessage:
Edits a bot's text message
```$editmessage [channel] msg_id text```
GmoveMessage:
Moves/Copies a message to another channel
```$movemessage msgid channel [copy] [silent]```
GbookmarkMessage:
Marks a certain message and dms users that react to the bookmark
```$bookmark msg_id/msg_link [description]```
GsimplePoll:
Creates a simple poll using 👍-👎
```$poll text```
Gaddresponse:
Adds a user response to bots replies
```$addresponse resposne```
GclearMessages:
Deletes a provided number of recent messages
```$clear number```
GdeleteMessage:
Begins a petition for deleting a certain message
```$deletemsg msg_link [reason]```
Gselfnotes:
Οι προσωπικές σας σημειώσεις
 ```$notes [add <note> / remove <index> / edit <index> <note> / clear]```
GKEP_drive:
Σας εγγράφει στο Dai Archive
```$drive register```
```$drive reader/writer email```
GKEP_myexams:
Στέλνει σε προσωπικό το πρόγραμμα εξεταστικής σας
```$myexams```
GKEP_mute:
Εξορίζει για ορισμένο χρόνο κάποιον **ανάγωγο**
```$mute member minutes [reason]```
GKEP_data:
Πουλάει τα δεδομένα σας στην Facebook με αντάλλαγμα 3 κουτιά Pringles
```$data αμ/member/'all'```
GKEP_myschedule:
Σας αποστέλει το εβδομαδίαιο σας πρόγραμμα
```$myschedule```
